thread.title: It has been alleged Bobbi Kristina Brown was murdered by Nick Gordon
thread.title_full: It has been alleged Bobbi Kristina Brown was murdered by Nick Gordon | Examiner.com

author: Harold Mandel
title: It has been alleged Bobbi Kristina Brown was murdered by Nick Gordon
text:
Photo by Bennett Raglin/Getty Images View all 8 photos Disturbing news has surfaced regarding the tragic death of Bobbi Kristina Brown . She may have been murdered by Nick Gordon . US Weekly reported on Oct. 9, 2015, Gordon has been accused of injecting Brown with a lethal toxic mixture. This shocking disclosure has been revealed in new court documents.
Photo by Dave Kotinsky/Getty Images The court documents are in response to the efforts of Gordon's legal team to stay an ongoing wrongful death lawsuit which has been filed by Brownâ€™s conservator Bedelia Hargrove. It is stated in the documents that Brown died due to a violent altercation Gordon. It is also stated that Gordon injected Brown with a toxic mixture and than he placed her in a bathtub while she was unconscious.
The Daily Mail reports it appears Gordon's arrest on murder charges is imminent. However lawyers for Gordon say the estate of Brown is trying to publicly vilify him and that the claims that Gordon murdered Brown are baseless. Gordon personally has denied all of the allegations of wrongdoing which have been made against him regarding the death of Brown.
Gordon has been charged with attempting to cover up the alleged altercation with Brown by changing his clothes after the fight they had in the bathroom. Also in a not very tasteful move it has been said Gordon was paid $40,000 to pose in front of Brown's grave for photographs for a magazine. However Gordon's lawyers have said Brown's estate has absolutely no proof for any of their claims. These claims followed a $40 million wrongful death lawsuit by Brown's estate. It's really sad to have to raise such tragic questions about the tragic death of Brown who is remembered as having been a very vivacious person.
